meanings.definition: A type of evergreen tree native to the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: The madrona tree stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy hiking among the beautiful madrona trees.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the park love to climb the madrona trees for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like the sturdy trunk of a madrona tree.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the madrona tree filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: The reddish-brown wood of the madrona tree.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved a beautiful bowl from madrona wood.
meanings.sent2: The furniture was made of polished madrona.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a picture of a madrona woodpecker.
meanings.sent4: The cabin had a cozy feel with its madrona wood walls.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cut madrona wood was delightful.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown color resembling the wood of the madrona tree.
meanings.sent1: Her hair had a lovely madrona hue.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in shades of madrona.
meanings.sent3: The cake was frosted in a delicious madrona color.
meanings.sent4: The artist mixed paints to achieve the perfect madrona shade.
meanings.sent5: The dress was a stunning madrona color that caught everyone's eye.
